explains: v. 使持续，使长久（尤指不好的事物）

sentences.en: Comics tend to perpetuate the myth that 'boys don't cry'.
sentences.cn: 连环画往往在延续着“男儿有泪不轻弹”的神话。

sentences.en: We must not perpetuate the religious divisions of the past.
sentences.cn: 我们绝不能使过去的宗教分裂继续下去。

sentences.en: They perpetuate the myth of the lone genius.
sentences.cn: 他们使孤独天才的神话永垂不朽。
